https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wogMEAkmHNRponkhYPqE7RQmMIO.jpg This piece is both a concert and a film that uses data as its material and theme, highlighting the ways in which data shapes our understanding of the world. Video images of landscapes are progressively abstracted into a language of data. C4I
